text: City of First Love () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Boris Yashin and Manos Zacharias.Умер режиссер Борис ЯшинГород первой любви (1970) It stars Yelena Alekina, Natalya Egorova, and Boris Galkin. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Yashin Category:Movies directed by Manos Zacharias
title: City of First Love
